backend/main.mo: Defines core Gita data types, mood enum with ordering, chapter generation, and chatbot response structures.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requests to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of all frontend files, describing their purpose and behavior for build planning.
frontend/docs/APP_STRUCTURE_AND_FLOWS.md: Developer documentation detailing app architecture, navigation flows, component responsibilities, and backend API surface.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions with theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app shell handling tab navigation, scroll reset, Krishna background, and global layout with fixed bottom nav.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Chat input component supporting text and voice input, sending messages, and rotating placeholders.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatSafetyM: Modal warning users that the chat is not therapy and provides safety guidance.
Renders a chat conversation with user and Krishna messages, optional verses, and follow-up questions.
frontend/src/components/chat/FollowUpQue: Displays clickable follow‑up question buttons related to a chat response.
frontend/src/components/chat/MiniAskKris: Compact text‑only input widget for submitting a question to Krishna.
frontend/src/components/decorations/Flow: Empty placeholder file for a decorative flower overlay component.
frontend/src/components/decorations/Kris: Fixed background component showing layered Krishna life scene images with a gradient overlay.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopMenuBa: Top navigation bar with tabs and theme toggle, handling navigation between major views.
frontend/src/components/settings/ThemeTo: Button that switches between light and dark themes using a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/today/TodaysWisd: Displays today's selected verse with loading state and navigation back to chapters.
Card showing verse details including Sanskrit, translations, Gen‑Z interpretation, and an action step.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth, including login, logout, and identity state using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch chapters, verses, curated verses, today's verse, and chatbot responses using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements a hook wrapping browser speech recognition to capture live transcripts with start/stop controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state synced with localStorage and system preferences with a toggle function.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom theme variables, dark mode tokens, animations, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Discover/DiscoverPage: Renders a mood selection grid and switches to a detailed mood view, enabling navigation to chat based on mood.
frontend/src/pages/Discover/MoodDetailVi: Shows curated verses for a selected mood with loading states and an option to start a chat.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home screen with hero section, Krishna image, mini chat widget, navigation buttons, and social links.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ChapterDetai: Displays chapter details and a scrollable table of verses, loading data via hooks and allowing verse selection.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ChapterListV: Shows a searchable list of chapters with loading states and a CTA for Today's Wisdom.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ReadGitaPage: Manages navigation between chapter list, chapter detail, verse detail, and today's wisdom views.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/VerseDetailV: Fetches and displays a single verse with loading fallback and back navigation.
frontend/src/pages/TalkToKrishna/TalkToK: Implements a chat interface with Krishna, handling message flow, mood context, API responses, and safety modal.
frontend/src/state/sessionContext.tsx: Provides session state for mood, message history, and pending messages through React context.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for styling across the app.
project_state.json: Defines the app’s current project state, including product vision, architectural notes, UI/UX constraints, known issues, required images, and existing feature metadata for the Gita Saar mobile-first app.
